name: NEFA - Cryptocurrency Web App (Community)
description:
Hello everyone! I introduce NEFA, a web application that provides buying and selling of cryptocurrencies.


This website uses gradient blue as the main color, a color that represents trust. And also this website uses 3D elements to beautify the appearance.


This website also displays 3 types of coins. Trending coins, top gainers coins, top losers coins and latest coins.


I hope you like it ‚ù§Ô∏è
